productSpecification: Yoga Mat - Size: 68inch x 24inch x 1/4 inch.
prodDescription: Yoga mats are a must for any gymgoer or yoga enthusiast! This is a vital tool to get the best out of your workout. Our yoga mats create a comfortable barrier between the user and the floor below, taking away any pressure that could otherwise be felt from exercising solely on the ground.These mats can be used for exercises apart from yoga also! They are great for Pilates, as well as stretching and mobility too. This mat can also be used for push ups, planks and other strength exercises! The best product for any workout!

Top-quality Olympic Bar made from high carbon steel.This 7ft Olympic Barbell is a must have for anyone serious about their strength training. 28mm in diameter and is for use with 2 in Olympic plates only. It is perfect for squats, deadlifts, overhead presses, bent over rows with or without plates. The stylish black oxide finish means it is more durable and long lasting than traditional chrome barbells. Weight plates will slide on easily for fast loading. The barbell handles are knurled to ensure maximum grip during workouts. The bar is 20kg in weight and can hold weight of up to 600kg

Dumbbells come equipped with a chrome plated dumbbell handle which is designed to provide the user with a firm and comfortable grip. The highly durable rubber dumbbell coating reduces the noise produced from dropping dumbbells on gym floors whilst also protecting the dumbbell from damage and protecting flooring Robust and durable hex dumbbell head. Available in a range of weights from 5.0kg to 30kg.

Made of Polyester 600d heavy duty material, Uzman Duffel bag is perfect for any activity and it also serves as a travel-bag. The lightweight and modern holdall gym bags are ideal for every sport and activity.These Compressible gym and Sport Bags come with a separate shoe compartment and a padded shoulder pad which makes it very comfortable to carry. productSpecification: 5 different colored bands - Yellow, Blue, Red, Green and Black band; use them alone or combine any of them to increase intensity; combined maximum resistance of 100 lbs.
prodDescription: The resistance bands set includes five exercise bands, one door anchor, two cushioned handles, strength training Exercise Resistance Bands bring you the same benefits of an expensive gym in a convenient and affordable home workout equipment set that lets you target your whole body. Our premium workout bands are made of the highest quality, using 100% Natural Latex with high elasticity and extra thick high-grade silicon, natural latex is kind to the environment. Strong wear resistance and perfect elasticity, steel metal buckle for stronger strength, non-slip handle, comfortable and absorbent.The resistance bands set includes five exercise bands, one door anchor, two cushioned handles and also a convenient travel pouch.

Hit Fitness Battle Ropes help build both stamina and strength simultaneously and was voted the best cardio workout by Men's Health Magazine. You can use this exercise as a main workout or for a finisher to top off your workout. Also called slam ropes, these ropes combine high-intensity work with strength and help you work multiple muscle groups at once. These ropes are made of highly durable material to withstand the punishment of your workouts.
 Exercises include: 
Standard Wave Slams, Lateral Whip, Jumping Slam and Plank Wave.

York Fitness Standard Cast Iron Weight Plates are designed to fit all standard 1 inch diameter bars. Made from steel and finished in black these hard wearing, durable weights proudly show the YORK brand name. The York Fitness Standard Weight Plates are perfect for increasing the workout load of your equipment. They can be added to all 1-inch dumbbell bars and barbells along with being used for plate loading appropriate equipment. A reliable set of quality weight plates is fundamental for compound exercises such as squats, deadlifts, bicep curls, military press, skull-crushers and bench presses.
